```{r Load libraries, message=F}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r Read csv}
cdi <- read.csv('cdi_data.csv')
```

```{r Data cleaning}
#Create new crimes/1000 variable
cdi$crm_1000 <- (cdi$crimes/cdi$pop)*1000
```
